import React from 'react' import s from './Users.module.css' import userPhoto from '../../assets/img/1521018917.png' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const User = ({user, followingInProgress , follow , unfollow}) => { return
{user.followed ? : }
{user.name}
{user.status}
} export default User
